channel.title: Client help please (i have a few things) Please Help
channel.description:
This is what the client files look like when i first open it [IMG]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww92/Mac3j2009/Problem2.jpg[/img]
This is the client code in the run
[code]@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause[/code]
then when i press run it says this [IMG]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww92/Mac3j2009/problem.jpg[/img]
Then this is the code for the build
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause[/code]
Then when i press build it says this [IMG]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww92/Mac3j2009/problem3.jpg[/img]
If someone could please help me wiht this im new to the clients i always used moparscape and i always have this problem with the run thing when i press it, but this is the first time, ive used build...
